pkgmetadata.longdescription: Meta-Analysis of Medians // Implements several methods to meta- analyze studies that report the sample median of the outcome. When the primary studies are one-group studies, the methods of McGrath et al. (2019) doi:10.1002/sim.8013 can be applied to estimate the pooled median. In the two-group context, the methods of McGrath et al. (2020) doi:10.1002/bimj.201900036 can be applied to estimate the pooled raw difference of medians across groups.
